duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the operations of the Accounting Department, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and bank reconciliations.
Recommend and develop policies, procedures, and systems in conjunction with the various operating groups within the company to meet company objectives.
Produce periodic financial reports and ensure compliance with accounting standards.
Produce the annual budget and forecasts, reporting significant budget differences to management.
Assist the executive leadership on a wide variety of special projects and compile special reports and models.
Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal government requirements.
Maintain knowledge of trends, developments, and best practices in the accounting profession and apply this knowledge to recommend and implement process and policy changes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Business Administration required. Master's preferred. Certified Public Accountant or Certified Management Accountant designation preferred.
